name: supernaturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that seems to be caused by forces that cannot be explained by science: He claims that people are supernaturally healed in his presence. a supernaturally gifted singer See
supernatural
More examplesFewer examplesAbove the car, flame-shaped curtains of red light wriggle supernaturally across the sky.Lynch and his wife, Linda, and their four supernaturally beautiful children live in Denver. A shot from the National Laboratory of Psychical Research reveals a knotted handkerchief allegedly tied supernaturally during a seance.A comic genius and an almost supernaturally gifted mimic, he was always much more comfortable playing other people.
